title: Final Challenge: Add a Feature
description: Choose and implement one additional feature for your Finance Tracker.
instructions:
Pick ONE of these features and implement it completely:

1. **Recurring Transactions** - Automatically create transactions on a schedule
2. **Budget Alerts** - Send notifications when approaching budget limits
3. **Monthly Reports** - Generate PDF or HTML reports of spending
4. **Data Visualization** - Add an endpoint that returns chart-ready data
5. **Import from Bank CSV** - Parse common bank export formats

Your implementation should include:
- Model/schema changes if needed
- Repository methods
- API endpoints
- Tests
- CLI command (optional)
